quote: Pain of the past never goes away, you just find a way to deal with it. And in the future....... all the promise it holds.... that's what keeps you moving forward, and out of the darkness.
quote_letters: PAIN OF THE PAST NEVER GOES AWAY YOU JUST FIND A WAY TO DEAL WITH IT AND IN THE FUTURE ALL THE PROMISE IT HOLDS THATS WHAT KEEPS YOU MOVING FORWARD AND OUT OF THE DARKNESS
